title: I'm a Fashion Editor Who Loves Effortless Vacation Essentialsâ€”25 Gap Finds That Caught My Eye
description: Many are even on major sale.
excerpt: Many are even on major sale.
text: If you have a warm-weather holiday coming up and aren't sure what to pack, let this practical yet chic roundup be your guide. Gap currently has a lovely selection of vacation-ready picks that make outfit planning easy. Not to mention many of them are on major sale right now and can easily be mixed and matched. Hello, travel capsule.Ahead, is a curated list of the best of the best vacation essentials to shop. I included everything from easy linen separates to cool denim shorts, effortless sandals, timeless dresses, and so much more. Keep scrolling to check out all of the stellar pieces that caught my eye. You won't be disappointed. Gap 100% Linen Oversized Shirt Bring on the linen shirt. Gap Balconette Bikini Top Gap 365 High Rise Linen-Blend Trousers Gap Vegan Leather Flip Flop Sandals Simple flip-flop sandals are trending. Gap Linen-Blend Square-Neck Maxi Dress Gap Modern Rib Halter Tank Top Classic totes are always a good idea. Gap Square-Neck One-Piece Swimsuit Into this minimalist contrast one-piece. Gap Linen-Blend Mini Shift Dress Gap 8" Mid Rise '90s Loose Denim Bermuda Shorts Gap Organic Cotton Poplin Classic Shirt Perfect time to borrow from the men's department. Gap Cap-Sleeve Eyelet Top Gap Easy Bubble Midi Skirt Pair this with the top above. Gap Linen-Blend Shell Tank Top To wear with the cool pants below. Gap Linen-Blend Relaxed Straight Ankle Pants I'm obsessed with the gingham print. Gap 100% Linen Easy Shorts I want these in every color. These come in black as well. Gap Linen-Blend Mini Dress Gap 100% Linen Tie-Front Shirt Easy, breezy, and super chic. Gap Striped Straw Bucket Hat Gap 100% Cotton Crochet Ankle Pants Gap 100% Cotton Crochet Tank Top Here's the top to complete the look. Gap Slouchy Straw Tote Bag Gap 11" Mid Rise Longline Denim Shorts Longer shorts are a favorite of fashion people.
html:
If you have a warm-weather holiday coming up and aren't sure what to pack, let this practical yet chic roundup be your guide. Gap currently has a lovely selection of vacation-ready picks that make outfit planning easy. Not to mention many of them are on major sale right now and can easily be mixed and matched. Hello, travel capsule.

Ahead, is a curated list of the best of the best vacation essentials to shop. I included everything from easy linen separates to cool denim shorts, effortless sandals, timeless dresses, and so much more. Keep scrolling to check out all of the stellar pieces that caught my eye. You won't be disappointed.
